Invocation Name: blogging ferret
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill will provide you with the latest information about what's new at AppFerret.io. New site features and functions are described along with updates on new third party partnerships with AppFerret.io. Additionally, up-coming events and special announcements are made via this skill.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
